description: Set of dashboards to monitor the health of the Pravega cluster

alert.message:
{
    "symptomid": "PRAVEGA-0000",
    "type": "Critical",
    "component": "segmentstore",
    "message": "For more info on the issue, please check the Knowledge Base page with code PRAVEGA-0000",
    "reason": "DataCorruptionException has been detected.",
    "appname": "pravega-cluster",
    "namespace": "pravega-namespace"
}
alert.name: Pravega Segment Store Data Corruption Exception Alert (PRAVEGA-0000)

panels.description: Check if a DataCorruptionException has been detected.
panels.title: Pravega Segment Store Data Corruption Exception Alert (PRAVEGA-0000)

alert.message:
{
    "symptomid": "PRAVEGA-0001",
    "type": "Critical",
    "component": "segmentstore",
    "message": "For more info on the issue, please check the Knowledge Base page with code PRAVEGA-0001",
    "reason": "Multiple Segment Store restarts have been detected in a short period of time.",
    "appname": "pravega-cluster",
    "namespace": "pravega-namespace"
}
alert.name: Pravega Segment Store Correlated Failures Alert (PRAVEGA-0001)

panels.description: Critical alert: Check if multiple Segment Store instances (>3) have been restarted in a short period of time (5 min).
panels.title: Pravega Segment Store Correlated Failures (PRAVEGA-0001)

alert.message:
{
    "symptomid": "PRAVEGA-0002",
    "type": "Critical",
    "component": "segmentstore",
    "message": "For more info on the issue, please check the Knowledge Base page with code PRAVEGA-0002",
    "reason": "Multiple Segment Container failures in a short period of time.",
    "appname": "pravega-cluster",
    "namespace": "pravega-namespace"
}
alert.name: Correlated Container Failures Alert (PRAVEGA-0002)

panels.description: Critical alert: Check if multiple segment containers are failing in a short period of time (>16 failovers within 5 mins).
panels.title: Correlated Segment Container Failures (PRAVEGA-0002)

alert.message:
{
 "symptomid": "PRAVEGA-1005",
"type": "Warning",
"component": "bookkeeper",
"message": "For more info on the issue, please check the Knowledge Base page with code PRAVEGA-1005",
"reason": "Writes to Bookkeeper exhibit slow performance.",
"appname": "pravega-cluster",
"namespace": "pravega-namespace"
}
alert.name: Bookkeeper Performance Degradation Alert (PRAVEGA-1005)

panels.description: Warning alert: Check if the writes to Bookkeeper are  too slow (90th percentile > 200ms).
panels.title: Bookkeeper Performance Degradation (PRAVEGA-1005)

    "reason": "Writes to Tier 2 exhibit low performance.",
